explanation: [0-0] A hand is holding a long blue balloon filled with sequins. The balloon is decorated with painted eyes and a mouth. A transparent bowl is placed beneath the balloon.

[0-7] A pair of pink scissors appears in the frame and cuts off the top of the balloon. The balloon deflates instantly, tightly containing the sequins. The hand squeezes the deflated balloon, but no sequins come out. Then, the scissors cut open the balloon, releasing the sequins into the bowl below.
